title: The Prince I Met in Another World is a Wolf - Novel Updates
tags: Animal Characteristics   Average-looking Protagonist   Awkward Protagonist   Demons   European Ambience   Handsome Male Lead   Nobles   Otome Game   R-18   Royalty   R*pe   Slow Romance   Sword And Magic   Transmigration   Transported into a Game World   Transported to Another World
author: やま
description:
Shun Tachibana, a math teacher and enthusiast, was someone who prided himself on being perfectly on the straight and narrow. Until one day, he awakened in a fantasy, otome game.

However, the heroine did not appear, and for some reason, Shun is repeatedly treated to kabedons and spell-like, pick up lines from the princes instead.

What’s more; he doesn’t even have a cheat skill, one of the most important things for reincarnating in another world! He then visits Craig, a former prince, for the sake of his survival, but it turns out Craig is a wolf. On a certain full moon night, Shun is attacked by him while he is in his estrous phase. After finding out about Craig’s situation, Shun offered to continue to “help” Craig through his estrous cycles.>
